data.description:
Turning your Meta Quest into a spatial computer by letting you place your web apps all around your space. You have an infinite canvas to browse, work, play, and relax.

Features

• Intuitive UX for placing and resizing windows
• Easy and precise controls
• Custom interface for your favorite apps like YouTube, Disney+, and more
• Native computer screen mirroring (BETA)

For more info, visit www.thespatial.app

changelog.change_log:
Release v1.6.

Added Sticky notes and To-do widgets
Implemented direct touch to all widgets and apps for both hands and controllers
Added dual hand support when enabling dual inputs in Settings
Moving windows now lower their opacity so you can place them easier
Added auto show keyboard
Improved UI with specular highlights to windows (basically windows are a bit shinier)
Fixed an issue where scrolling outside of a window would cause weird, unintended scrolling.

Added a Plex app to our library.
Added a back button to more apps like YouTube, Amazon, X, and more.
Fixed an issue where moving windows with hands would incorrectly resize them.
Fixed an issue where resizing in fullscreen would change the video’s aspect ratio, adding black bars to the sides.

Release v1.5.5

Introducing Widgets!
- Releasing our first iteration of widgets with more to come in the future! 
- Check out our Clock, Stopwatch, Timer and Calculator!

Release v1.4.1
- Fixed an issue where some back buttons didn’t work
- Added bluetooth keyboard support.

Release v1.4.0
- Added the most requested apps to our app-drawer

Release v1.3.1 
- Fixed an issue where the system keyboard was used for the browser

Release v1.3.0 - Major
- Fixed a bug when joystick scrolling not worked on the left controller.
- Added a bookmark feature to the browser.
- You can bookmark any page you like, and have quick access!
